name: block boy (sylin54)
description:
You play as block boy who has to chase the light pink block of eltra and whenever he catches it he adds some to his soul and gets a mystical number called "score"

He dies if he doesn't catch though for "reasons"

Also the number of the score he collects before he dies resembles his dedication and stamina its called "highscore"

This is game I made for the gmtk game jam I'm still a beginner but I hope it will entertain you
